messages.message: @Jonathan Shih right click -> “open as annotator” doesn’t work for IBOCR (i’m not sure why that button is even there or if it ever did — it’s not there for redactor/visual-refiner which are almost identical structurally).

if you want to annotate it, open the annotator app from launcher and then use `hari/my-data/fs/Instabase Drive/UAE/id/run_jmshih/2019-08-21-16:54:01/e64ccb43-9783-4818-b16c-cf87173b6a1e` as the template directory

I followed those steps and it worked: https://dogfood.instabase.com/apps/annotator/edit/hari/my-data/fs/Instabase%20Drive/UAE/id/run_jmshih/2019-08-21-16:54:01/e64ccb43-9783-4818-b16c-cf87173b6a1e/test-chetan.ibannotator
ah okay cool xD haha good to know
